scripts.gc:list:aws: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output --env-file=aws.env grucloud-cli list -p aws --json output/gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file output/gc.dot
scripts.gc:info:gcp: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud-cli --infra iac_google.js  info --provider google --config input/config.js
scripts.gc:list:gcp: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud-cli --infra iac_google.js list -p google --config input/config.js --json output/gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file output/gc.dot
scripts.gc:info:os: docker run --env-file=openstack.env --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud-cli --infra iac_openstack.js info --provider openstack
scripts.gc:list:os: docker run --env-file=openstack.env --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud-cli --infra iac_openstack.js list -p openstack --json output/gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file output/gc.dot
